comment: Yehi to kaam hai inka faltu ke trends arrest him arrest her ko promote krna
amr:
# ::snt Yehi to kaam hai inka faltu ke trends arrest him arrest her ko promote krna
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (y / yehi
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (k / kaam
                        :mode expressive))
            :op2 (ii / inka
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (f / faltu))
            :op3 (t / trend))
      :snt3 (a2 / arrest-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (h / he))
      :snt4 (a3 / arrest-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y4 / you)
            :ARG1 (s / she))
      :snt5 (p / promote-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y4
            :ARG1 (k2 / krna)))

comment: Bhai inko tension nhi hai kisi cheez ki..malum hai naukri th mil he jaeygi Bhim ki shakti jo hai
amr:
# ::snt Bhai inko tension nhi hai kisi cheez ki..malum hai naukri th mil he jaeygi Bhim ki shakti jo hai
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (b / bhai
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (t / tension))
            :op2 (k / kisi
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (c / cheez))
            :op3 (k2 / kisi
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (c2 / cheez)))
      :snt2 a
      :op1 (b2 / bhai
            :mode expressive
            :mod (m2 / mil))
      :op2 (b3 / bhai
            :mode expressive
            :mod (m3 / malum))
      :op3 (b4 / bhai
            :mode expressive
            :mod m2)
      :op4 (b5 / bhai
            :mode expressive
            :mod (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Jaey"
                        :op2 "Ghim"
                        :op3 "Kakti")))
      :op5 (b6 / bhai
            :mode expressive
            :mod (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Jharmaey"
                        :op2 "Ghim"))
            :mod (p3 / person
                  :mode expressive
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Shakti"))))
